review: If you don't get one of these, you're crazy.  It is awesome!  I just got one and all of my devices can send video instantly to the tv. I'm buying another one for a second TV.  It does exactly what it says it does -- for lack of better description it sends a wireless video signal to your tv instantly.  It works really well.Reading other random reviews: yes there's a slight lag at times (depending on the use of my home wifi) but it's never more than a couple seconds.  It's not exactly for streaming live video like netflix...I believe you would get a choppy lag if you tried to stream that but it works for looking at websites on the tv (using chromecast browser extension) and watching youtube videos.  From the phone it's only compatible with certain apps.To me, this is all fine -- I mean this item is what it is...it's in its infancy and will only get better.  The thing can update itself so as more apps and sites integrate with it, chromecast will update itself.  It's easy easy easy to setup, I mean I think anyone could do it.Look, it's not a wireless video cable -- you're not going to magically get a tv 'monitor'...it's meant for sharing video/websites from popular sources.  I can't really tell you enough to just get it and enjoy it but don't expect it to create a wireless monitor connection.This thing is impressive.
